title: Client is getting stuck since the 7.13 patch got released.
body: keep getting stuck for the first 5 seconds i try to use it, and i'm having bug splat on the client itself(and not during games). this all started happening today (28 jun) since the new patch got released. need help please.

replies.body: I have a similar problem, the latest patch never came to my laptop. It came to my brothers laptop though. I did everything for hours now. Its frustrating, and my ticket has a time wait of 3 days.

It's strange to hear you're bugsplatting on the client, but the fix might be an easy one.  This can happen for a few reasons like bad game files or drivers, so I recommend downloading the [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) as your first step.  Use this to run a force repatch and fix up any files.

Should the issue persists, check out our [game crash](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes+) guide as well to make sure drivers are up to date and able to render assets in the client properly.

Let me know if these steps work out for you.
hey. tried what you have offered, didn't work for me. the client still crushes. help is needed. {{item:3070}}

Thanks for the update, though it sucks the issue is still happening.  In this case, grab the logs provided by the HRT and attach them to a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).  Our tech guys can keep working with you directly to figure out what's going on.  Don't give up!
Having the same issue. Open through the Desktop shortcut, splash logo comes up, with yellow loading bar underneath. It loads part way then seems to "fail" and closes after a brief time.

This can happen if your security settings changed and blocking the client from launching.  No worries though, the steps in the [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide should guide you towards a fix.  Let me know if you run into any issues, though.

Problem still persisting after all suggestions on the [permissions guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions). Getting frustrated. It was literally working before the patch, no issues. The download speed was good initially for the patch then just dies down to nothing and closes the client. So that's when I tried to reinstall and am having this issue at the splash screen.

There might be a few more steps we can take to get this fixed up.  Download the [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) to grab some logs, and attach them to a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).  Our tech team can take a look with you individually to see what's going on.  We'll see you there!

Also having this problem, yesterday I downloaded the new patch and then instant bugsplat. So I uninstalled and reinstalled and now it just won't download to the new client. I've tried everything now including hextech repairs,deleting files and trying to run as administrator but still nothing. Help please
Just the same one problem please help us support ;(
